attributes.action: Give us the right to decide about our futures
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The people in this Country are fed up of being told how and what we can do when others call all the shots. We want to decide who will buy our land and not have it Compulsory Purchased for the Travelling Community. If they want to be Travellers then let them travel. It is not the responsibility of the Government to house these people who pay no taxes or charges unlike the rest of us and we now want to stand up and be counted

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
False or incomplete name or address information
